main(String[]) - Static method in class SpaceSnake
 
MainController - Class in controller
Creates view and subcontrollers, handles events from the keyboard and implements actions from subcontrollers
MainController(View) - Constructor for class controller.MainController
Constructor that adds a reference to the view, configures the view and adds subcontrollers and starts the startup menu
MainWindow - Class in view
This is a class that just contains the MainWindow in one JFrame

Constructor that generates the window.

Constructor that creates the main window and adds an ActionListener to it.

MapFigure - Class in view.map
The class for figures in the game view.

Constructor that takes a position (x,y) and a size and generates a GameFigure.
MAPLAYER - Static variable in class view.MainWindow
Default layer for the map (far back).
mapSize - Variable in class view.map.MapView
 
MapView - Class in view.map
This is a class that just contains the game itself Is listener to itself in order to zoom and other stuff.
